title: I cant install
body:
Hello guys i having a problem of lol installing
When I trying to install a lol setup and it shows error that "The application ran into a problem that it couldn't handle " 
Please guys help me  ;(
P.s sorry for my English :(

replies.body: Hmmmm it kind of sounds like some of the client files might be damaged or corrupted. If you can, grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the option **reinstall and clean uninstall** to try and get a clean install this time around!
